entry.title: Django: Using IntellijIdea Within Virtualenv
entry.content:
I have added virtualenv folder’s python to project sdk. The virtualenv directory’s python( for example venv/bin/python2.7) needs to be added to Intellij Idea project path. Example: need to go to file>project structure (intellij Idea).

https://skydrive.live.com/embed?cid=F17C9687806497C4&resid=F17C9687806497C4!5177&authkey=ADdrD8ChkJ_P504" width="320" height="580">

Press new in Project SDK and add new path to virtualenv’s python directory like this:

https://skydrive.live.com/embed?cid=F17C9687806497C4&resid=F17C9687806497C4%215178&authkey=AG-scf6m-L1PmQo" width="320" height="580">

Now press ok and final look of the Project settings:

https://skydrive.live.com/embed?cid=F17C9687806497C4&resid=F17C9687806497C4%215179&authkey=AEq7Q5cmolDIND4" width="320" height="580">

and Voila!! projects run on virtualenv.

Here is my answer in stackoverflow: http://stackoverflow.com/questions/20877106/using-intellijidea-within-an-existing-virtualenv/20879661#20879661
